title: Recruiting for OOL for 2017 ( Diamond 2 +)

embed.description: The latest Tweets from Team Iron (@TeamIronEsports). No Doubt! No Fear! Australian Esports organisation. Follow for the latest updates on the team!. Australia

body:
Team Iron is looking to recruit for there League of legends team for 2017. Have what it takes to take on the best? Prove it by applying!

Were currently looking for:

Top
Jungle
Mid
ADC
Support

were also looking for coaching staff.

Our goal is entry into the challenger series, and eventually the Pro league.

we are looking for dedicated, hardworking and team orientated players. Players will also have to be punctual for scrims and meetings.

It will soon be a new year, so its time for a new team to rise up.

Leave a comment here or leave a DM at our twitter (link above). You can also message me on League, add BreakVG

Thanks for your time.

Martin 'BreakVG'

No Doubt!, No Fear!
